mean_cn: adj. 分割的，交叉的，重合的
mean_en: If two or more lines or roads intersect, they meet or cross each other. You can also say that one line or road intersects another.
word_etyma: inter互相+sect切，割+ed形容词后缀→intersected交叉的
sentence: The train tracks intersected each other at the station.
sentence_trans: 火车轨道在车站互相交叉。
